article.title: Do the benefits of outsourcing outweigh the disadvantages?
article.abstract: Current Trends in Intelligence Outsourcing Affect Work Force Stability. by Vinh Nguyen
article.text: Outsourcing of intelligence activities raises questions of both financial costs and accountability. It is an intricate activity for which the line of inherently governmental functions is rapidly disappearing and for which there has been little or no congressional oversight.Â
